original.text: I used this luggage locker service during my visit and everything went super smoothly. The process was easy and secure. The lockers were clean and spacious and I really appreciated being able to access my bags whenever I needed!! Overall, great service! I‚Äôd definitely use it again ‚ò∫Ô∏è

The lockers were clean and spacious and I really appreciated being able to access my bags whenever I needed!! Overall, great service! I‚Äôd definitely use it again ‚ò∫Ô∏è

original.text: The lockers were extremely clean, safe and well-maintained. The whole process was very easy, the price was fair, and I felt completely comfortable and safe leaving my luggage here. Highly recommended!!

translations.en: The lockers were extremely clean, safe and well-maintained. The whole process was very easy, the price was fair, and I felt completely comfortable and safe leaving my luggage here. Highly recommended!!

original.text:

original.text: Amazing service, didn't have where to leave the luggage and the station was packed. 100% recommended if you're stopping by Cordoba
